control.name: Str1
control.actionexpr: chatbox[\/attr str 1]&&chatbox[`/ub delay 500 /ub mexec uisetlabel[uigetcontrol[Attributes, Strength], Strength \\\: +tostring[getcharattribute_base[1]]]`]

control.name: Str1?
control.actionexpr: chatbox[\/xp str 1]

control.name: Str10
control.actionexpr: chatbox[\/attr str 10]&&chatbox[`/ub delay 500 /ub mexec uisetlabel[uigetcontrol[Attributes, Strength], Strength \\\: +tostring[getcharattribute_base[1]]]`]

control.name: Str10?
control.actionexpr: chatbox[\/xp str 10]
